Author: loafloafloafloaf
Text: ya!! it's hard bc in my experience, my monkey brain is like "just be skinny and everything will be ok :)" when im still soft and super weak and get winded from going up stairs. im glad you're thinking about exercise! ive been thinking about going to a class to hold myself accountable (but... expensive...) i hope you make the steps to have a better body image! :-D  ~~srry if this sounds fake happy but im hyping myself up for exercising after school!! i hope u get hyped up too! <3 U GOT THIS!!~~
